adv: I think this tool is very helpful when you need to explore and understand dataset. In this scenario, the related view is useful by allowing you to investigate starting from a couple of columns to more columns, so that you can have deeper understanding around such fields. Other capabilities like bookmark, load more is also convenient.
disadv: It doesn't allow to the aggregation that I want - sum or mean. It sometimes made me difficult to solve some tasks or when I have a specific purpose. When there are many categorical values, showing them with different color is not useful, it would be good if the system automatically aggregate them in a more condensed visualization.
comment: It would be helpful if you highlight column names in the questions. When I mistakenly click backspace button, I lost what I've done. It would good if it automatically save what I've done.
